Title: Pulses
Description: This recommendation is inclusive for pulses such as 'Green Gram (Mung)', 'Black Gram (Udid)', 'Gram (Chana)', 'Red Gram (Arhar)', 'Pea','French Bean (Rajma)'

Title: Cereals
Description: This recommendation is inclusive for pulses such as 'Paddy','Wheat','Maize','Jowar (Sorghum)', 'Bajra (Pearl Millet)'

Title: Oilseeds
Description: This recommendation is inclusive for pulses such as 'Groundnut', 'Soybean', 'Sunflower', 'Sesame', 'MuSeed Treatmentard'

Title: Vegetables
Description: This recommendation is inclusive for pulses such as 'Tomato', 'Chilli' ,'Capsicum' ,'Brinjal'
